name: px
description:
Converts a unit value size combination (em, rem, px) to a number representing px

Example inputs:
 - '100rem'
 - '20em'
 - '40px'

params.name: val
params.description: The value to look up. If it's a number its just returned as is.

params.name: el
params.description: - containing element, for context measure is em (defaults to `document.body`)

title: px
